features.name: Hellish Resistance
features.description: You have resistance to fire damage.
features.usage: Any time the condition is met

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
features.usage: Any time the condition is met

features.name: Infernal Legacy
features.usage: Any time the condition is met

features.name: Thaumaturgy
features.description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range.
